      <div class="content-border pager-offset"><h2 class = "black-bar-header">Notícias Mais Recentes</h2><div class="view view-news-recent view-id-news_recent view-display-id-teaser view-dom-id-30911d9b58997406031bd5e7b3a2e833">
        
  
  
      
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76690">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte" title="Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35783" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">

  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/dos-mantos-vermelhos-apenas-um-em-recife">Dos mantos vermelhos, apenas um em Recife</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Final antecipada entre Red Canids e paiN Gaming promete muita emoção. A Matilha enfrenta o arsenal vasto da paiN Gaming. A expectativa é para uma série longa e disputada até o último jogo, mas apenas uma camisa rubro-negra será vista em Recife.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76520">2 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>

            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-f9180490-344e-4e01-ac4e-160d931160b9');

                    initCard();

                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();

            var jqueryTimeout;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-25646181-b1a2-4556-bf85-3b2ecf010960');

                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);

                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();

                  media="screen"

                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 20:13:34 --></html>

class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">VÍDEO: do DeLorean ao Citroën 2CV, Salão de Paris exibe carros do cinema</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Feira inclui exibição de clássicos de várias épocas e até do videogame.
Mais importante do ano, Salão de Paris termina neste domingo, 16.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="6"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/09/carro-de-john-lennon-nao-empolga-e-e-leiloado-por-quase-metade-do-preco.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/tJv-Q8O-fCbK6PFT_vala23yFBU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/12/lennon_austin_princess_5.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/_JOZi5qRG7b_y5RlHZWUOWY0eLk=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/12/lennon_austin_princess_5.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/j9Gg1l8hoNDQndFQpv4kPIiv2ig=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/12/lennon_austin_princess_5.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/tJv-Q8O-fCbK6PFT_vala23yFBU=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/12/lennon_austin_princess_5.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Auto Esporte</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 6 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/09/carro-de-john-lennon-nao-empolga-e-e-leiloado-por-quase-metade-do-preco.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Carro de John Lennon não empolga e é leiloado por quase metade do preço</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Limusine Austin Princess foi vendida por cerca de R$ 587 mil. 
Expectativa de casa de leilões era ultrapassar R$ 1 milhão.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/08/dono-da-restauradora-de-carros-classicos-para-os-funcionarios.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/slbnTtBd80HInHjcS5xuFOo2X14=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/30/cmc_becomes_an_eot_1_ph_david_bagnall.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/FQViti7i5bsPztIJOqPSmhbNWKc=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/30/cmc_becomes_an_eot_1_ph_david_bagnall.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/L7FgbCL6BJE57K20b8tSn_69ZTE=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/30/cmc_becomes_an_eot_1_ph_david_bagnall.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/slbnTtBd80HInHjcS5xuFOo2X14=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/30/cmc_becomes_an_eot_1_ph_david_bagnall.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Auto Esporte</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/08/dono-da-restauradora-de-carros-classicos-para-os-funcionarios.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Dono &#039;dá&#039; restauradora de carros  clássicos para os funcionários</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Na Inglaterra, 60 funcionários viram &#039;sócios&#039; da oficina de clássicos.
Restauradora é especializada em modelos da Jaguar.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/08/primeiro-shelby-cobra-e-vendido-por-r-44-milhoes-em-leilao.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/AqfGZi7qtejyDw3RcVyYTaRvgz0=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/06/30/shelby_cobra_3.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/RbYfE4hb-wn1-Y3wt180LPmqAP0=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/06/30/shelby_cobra_3.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/oZffoIHLQNMcTyjlchzqkX487EY=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/06/30/shelby_cobra_3.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/AqfGZi7qtejyDw3RcVyYTaRvgz0=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/06/30/shelby_cobra_3.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Auto Esporte</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/08/primeiro-shelby-cobra-e-vendido-por-r-44-milhoes-em-leilao.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Primeiro Shelby Cobra é vendido por R$ 44 milhões em leilão</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Carro feito em 1962 ficou com Carroll Shelby durante toda sua vida.
É o modelo americano mais caro já vendido em leilão. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/08/com-24-cv-pequeno-fiat-polski-vira-sensacao-em-cuba.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/sQ8m9qhxvQFgRPU7iXjjSz11uaQ=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/17/sop_ap_spani_span_cu_fran.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/gR-G6eFHZU9lJ-bfJIK4CvJosfQ=/810x456/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/17/sop_ap_spani_span_cu_fran.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/VNi5pMOIFQBvG-aXniUAhyxRR_Y=/1080x608/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/17/sop_ap_spani_span_cu_fran.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/sQ8m9qhxvQFgRPU7iXjjSz11uaQ=/540x304/top/smart/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/08/17/sop_ap_spani_span_cu_fran.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Auto Esporte</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 7 meses</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/2016/08/com-24-cv-pequeno-fiat-polski-vira-sensacao-em-cuba.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Com 24 cv, pequeno Fiat Polski vira sensação em Cuba</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Fiat 126 feito na Polônia é objeto de desejo na ilha de Fidel Castro.

   <a href="/carros/autoesporte/videos/_/trilhos/4f23189396bfbb6942000010/mais_vistos" rel="nofollow">mais vistos</a>
</div>

            <div class="filtro-busca">

						<h1><a href="http://g1.com.br" title="G1 - O portal de noticias da globo"><span>G1 - O portal de noticias da globo</span></a></h1>
		
		<a class="linkBlog" href="http://g1.globo.com/blog-do-dodo/platb/" title="">Blog do Dodô &#8211; Dodô Azevedo</a>

		<div class="descricao">
			<ul>
						<li class="linkrss"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/blog-do-dodo/platb/feed/"><img src="http://g1.globo.com/blog-do-dodo/platb/wp-content/themes/globo.com/images/icoRss.jpg"/> rss do blog</a></li>
